channel.title: Distributed Proofreaders Canada - Latest Releases
channel.description: The latest news related to Distributed Proofreaders Canada

item.title: Distributed Proofreaders Canada News Update for Monday, January 9th, 2012
item.description: Please support the DPC program to resist the attempted increase in copyright to Life + 50 years. See my post at http://www.pgdpcanada.net/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=2354

item.title: Distributed Proofreaders Canada News Update for Sunday, January 1st, 2012
item.description:
Welcome to the New Year!!
And we're off to a racing start, with "Bez przewodnika" being our first book posted for 2012. Congratulations to our new, and very energetic, Team Poland. -----------------------------------------------------------

item.title: Distributed Proofreaders Canada News Update for Tuesday, December 13th, 2011
item.description:
At this time of the year, I'd like to thank all the members who come to DPC, and do a great deal of work collectively--but never raise their voices.
We do notice the impact you have on the workflow, and appreciate it greatly!!
--------------------------------------------

item.title: Distributed Proofreaders Canada News Update for Wednesday, September 28th, 2011
item.description:
The links on the Proofing and Formatting interface to the Guidelines are now fixed!!!
You'll find a link to the Proofing and to the Formatting Guidelines in all rounds.

item.title: Distributed Proofreaders Canada News Update for Wednesday, September 21st, 2011
item.description: The latest version of the Formatting Guidelines is now in the wiki at FAQ Formatting Guidelines. They came into effect September 2010, and have been tweaked several times since then. The next major update is planned for February 2012.

item.title: Distributed Proofreaders Canada News Update for Wednesday, September 21st, 2011
item.description: The latest version of the Formatting Guidelines is now in the wiki at FAQ Formatting Guidelines. They came into effect September 2010, and have been tweaked several times since then. The next major update is planned for February 2012.

item.title: Distributed Proofreaders Canada News Update for Wednesday, September 7th, 2011
Distributed Proofreaders Canada News Update for Friday, August 26th, 2011
item.description: The revised version 3.0 of the Proofreading Guidelines are now in the wiki at FAQ Proofreading Guidelines. They come into effect immediately, and will be considered as the basis for P3 applications as of September 1, 2011.
